&lt;b style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;Spoiler warning for Episode 4&lt;/b&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;b style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;!&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;font color=&quot;#505050&quot;&gt;&lt;br style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;After last episode&#039;s reveal that the ICA is being manipulated, the data sent to previous clients is traced to a farm in Colorado. While the suspected hacker herself is nowhere to be found, a prime suspect for the shadow client is, as well as three other marked ICA targets.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;While it&#039;s generally understood that these people are some sort of terrorist organisation, not much cause for killing these people is given. I felt genuinely bad about killing one target, Penelope Graves, after following her around and watching her check in on different stations just to see that they were going okay.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;Even the provided intel on her laments the fact that this kind and intelligent girl could have been a valuable asset, but &quot;a contract is a contract&quot;. In a mission where the integrity of the ICA itself is being questioned, these morally ambiguous targets add to the story rather than feeling incomplete.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
